decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to manipulate the graveyard by cycling cards and utilizing the cascade mechanic to cast Living End, a powerful board wipe that brings back all creatures from the graveyard. The deck focuses on creating a critical mass of creatures in the graveyard, while also having disruption through counter spells like Force of Negation. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with a large number of creatures, advantageously utilizing the cascade triggers to create a board state that is difficult for the opponent to recover from.

This deck aims to leverage the power of Indomitable Creativity to cheat out big creatures like Archon of Cruelty while using a mix of control spells and Planeswalkers to control the game. The deck also includes a land package that allows for flexibility and consistency in mana fixing. The main goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up a game-winning combo with Indomitable Creativity, showcasing a unique and creative approach to gameplay.
